doc:
Jack Haig (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jack_Haig_(actor) 0 Jack Haig (born John Cecil Coppin, 5 January 1913 – 4 July 1989) was an English actor who specialised in supporting roles, mainly in Television comedy. He was best known for playing Monsieur Roger LeClerc in the British sitcom 'Allo 'Allo!. Jack_Haig ( born John_Cecil_Coppin , 5_January_1913 – 4_July_1989 ) was an_English_actor who specialised in supporting_roles , mainly in Television_comedy . He was_best_known for playing Monsieur_Roger_LeClerc in the_British_sitcom ' Allo_'_Allo ! .
